tasks.label: Run
tasks.command: python3 manage.py makemigrations && python3 manage.py migrate --run-syncdb && python3 manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000

tasks.label: Test
tasks.command: python3 manage.py makemigrations ; python3 manage.py migrate --run-syncdb; coverage run manage.py test ; coverage report > coverage.txt ; flake8 acme_bank_api > quality.txt ; python3 hackerrank_parser.py
